title: Client freezes in champ select (ranked)
body: today i went to play ranked since im in my promos and only needed one more win, and while summoner 4 was selecting my client stopped working, like it was lagging which after a 2 minute delay returned me to the queue screen. after waiting 5 minutes from my ban i tried again and this time is did the same thing freezing when a summoner picked a champion and froze on 0 seconds. now i've lost lp and i dont know if my client is bugged because my internet runs just fine seeing as my browser didn't dc from various sites :(

replies.body: I have the same problem, It happened before but since my computer was having some problems I thought it might've been my computer's fault, but recently it has happened way too many times and I can play any other game perfectly.

I HAVE FINALLY FOUND A 100% FIX

Press Ctrl+R
Type CMD and Enter
Type ipconfig/release
Type ipconfig/renew
Type ipconfig/Flushdns

Make sure you don't have the client open when you do this. Gl Guys

Hey there,

Did the client actually freeze or become "non responsive"? Or do you mean you were still able to select things, however they wouldn't actually be selected?

i would say non-responsive seeing as i could click to change summoners but the change itself wouldn't be implemented as you said. then after a delay i would be kicked out of queue seeing as it happened right before i was next to pick a champ

Hey there,

Sorry for the delayed response.

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
